Description:
Authentic, beautiful, emotional football! Time-tested gameplay FIFA got even better thanks to innovations that encourage creative play in midfield and allows you to set the tempo. Create poignant moments and have neither the incomparable pleasure of scoring goals! FIFA 14 supports EA SPORTS Football Club - an online service, so you always stay in touch with the world of football and this, of course, with like-minded people. And of course, the regular season continues the tradition of the famous series of best-fit to the real sport: the game includes only licensed clubs, leagues and more than 15,000 athletes. Now you can change the width of the step of virtual players to choose the approach angle of the ball so that spend the most dangerous attack on goal, as well as punching spontaneously and even an awkward position. "Tat" in the middle of the field and set the pace of the game, block defenders, dribbling performing at any speed and in any direction, occupies a favorable position before taking the ball to the opponent failed to select it. Develop and improve its network of scouts and looking for talent! Evaluate players, learning their characteristics, to determine which of them will strengthen your team. With the new coaching center to handle reports of scouts coming in real time, it has become much easier and more convenient.
